::Hell Drak/Necromancer::

Hell Drak rolled out of the way of the missile, barely avoiding it.

"Hey asshole, take this!" Hell Drak yelled, firing another lazer at
Blindfear.
~~~~~~~~~
Necromancer was hit by the missile, and was sent smashing into a wall.

"Err.....For the Maximals!" Necromancer yelled with pride, firing 2 lazer
discs at Blindfear.
